verses.text: If thou wilt \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto me: and if thou wilt put \w away|strong="H5493"\w* thine \w abominations|strong="H8251"\w* out of my \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, then shalt thou not \w remove|strong="H5110"\w*.

And thou shalt \w swear|strong="H7650"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, in \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, in \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and in \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*; and the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* themselves in him, and in him shall they \w glory|strong="H1984"\w*.

¶ For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, Break \w up|strong="H5214"\w* your fallow \w ground|strong="H5215"\w*, and \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* not among \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w*.

\w Circumcise|strong="H4135"\w* yourselves to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w foreskins|strong="H6190"\w* of your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, ye \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: lest my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* like \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* that none can \w quench|strong="H3518"\w* \add it\add*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w evil|strong="H7455"\w* of your \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*.

\w Declare|strong="H5046"\w* ye in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w publish|strong="H8085"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Blow|strong="H8628"\w* ye the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*, gather \w together|strong="H4390"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Assemble|strong="H0622"\w* yourselves, and let us \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w defenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

Set \w up|strong="H5375"\w* the \w standard|strong="H5251"\w* toward \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: \w retire|strong="H5756"\w*, \w stay|strong="H5975"\w* not: for I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* from the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*.\f + \fr 4.6 \ft retire: or, strengthen\f*\f + \fr 4.6 \ft destruction: Heb. breaking\f*

The \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* is come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from his \w thicket|strong="H5441"\w*, and the \w destroyer|strong="H7843"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* is on his \w way|strong="H5265"\w*; he is gone \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* from his \w place|strong="H4725"\w* to \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8047"\w*; \add and\add* thy \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* shall be laid \w waste|strong="H5327"\w*, without an \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w*.

For this \w gird|strong="H2296"\w* you with \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, \w lament|strong="H5594"\w* and \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*: for the \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* is not turned \w back|strong="H7725"\w* from us.

And it shall come to pass at that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add that\add* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, and the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*; and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* shall be \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w*, and the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* shall \w wonder|strong="H8539"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, \w Ah|strong="H0162"\w*, \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*! \w surely|strong="H0403"\w* thou hast \w greatly|strong="H5377"\w* \w deceived|strong="H5377"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye shall have \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*; whereas the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w reacheth|strong="H5060"\w* unto the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

At that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* shall it be \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, A \w dry|strong="H6703"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* of the high \w places|strong="H8205"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, not to \w fan|strong="H2219"\w*, nor to \w cleanse|strong="H1305"\w*,

\add Even\add* a \w full|strong="H4392"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* from those \add places\add* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto me: now also will I \w give|strong="H1696"\w* \w sentence|strong="H4941"\w* against them.\f + \fr 4.12 \ft a full…: or, a fuller wind than those\f*\f + \fr 4.12 \ft give…: Heb. utter judgments\f*

Behold, he shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* as \w clouds|strong="H6051"\w*, and his \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* \add shall be\add* as a \w whirlwind|strong="H5492"\w*: his \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* are \w swifter|strong="H7043"\w* than \w eagles|strong="H5404"\w*. \w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* unto us! for we are \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*.

O \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* from \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*, that thou mayest be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*. How long shall thy \w vain|strong="H0205"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* thee?

For a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w declareth|strong="H5046"\w* from \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, and \w publisheth|strong="H8085"\w* \w affliction|strong="H0205"\w* from \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*.

Make ye \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* to the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*; behold, \w publish|strong="H8085"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \add that\add* \w watchers|strong="H5341"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from a \w far|strong="H4801"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, and give \w out|strong="H5414"\w* their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* against the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

As \w keepers|strong="H8104"\w* of a \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, are they against her round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*; because she hath been \w rebellious|strong="H4784"\w* against me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w* and thy \w doings|strong="H4611"\w* have \w procured|strong="H6213"\w* these \add things\add* unto thee; this \add is\add* thy \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*, because it is \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w*, because it \w reacheth|strong="H5060"\w* unto thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

¶ My \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w*, my \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w*! I am \w pained|strong="H2342"\w* at my \w very|strong="H7023"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* maketh a \w noise|strong="H1993"\w* in me; I cannot hold my \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*, because thou hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, O my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, the \w alarm|strong="H8643"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 4.19 \ft my very…: Heb. the walls of my heart\f*

\w Destruction|strong="H7667"\w* upon \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w* is \w cried|strong="H7121"\w*; for the whole \w land|strong="H0776"\w* is \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*: \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* are my \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*, \add and\add* my \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* in a \w moment|strong="H7281"\w*.
How long shall I \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w standard|strong="H5251"\w*, \add and\add* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*?

For my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add is\add* \w foolish|strong="H0191"\w*, they have not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* me; they \add are\add* \w sottish|strong="H5530"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and they have none \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*: they \add are\add* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* to do \w evil|strong="H7489"\w*, but to do \w good|strong="H3190"\w* they have no \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*.

I \w beheld|strong="H7200"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and, lo, \add it was\add* without \w form|strong="H8414"\w*, and \w void|strong="H0922"\w*; and the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and they \add had\add* no \w light|strong="H0216"\w*.
I \w beheld|strong="H7200"\w* the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and, lo, they \w trembled|strong="H7493"\w*, and all the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* moved \w lightly|strong="H7043"\w*.
I \w beheld|strong="H7200"\w*, and, lo, \add there was\add* no \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and all the \w birds|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* were \w fled|strong="H5074"\w*.

I \w beheld|strong="H7200"\w*, and, lo, the fruitful \w place|strong="H3759"\w* \add was\add* a \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof were broken \w down|strong="H5422"\w* at the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add and\add* by his \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*.

For thus hath the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The whole \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*; yet will I not \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a full \w end|strong="H3617"\w*.

For this shall the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w*, and the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* be \w black|strong="H6937"\w*: because I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*, I have \w purposed|strong="H2161"\w* \add it\add*, and will not \w repent|strong="H5162"\w*, neither will I turn \w back|strong="H7725"\w* from it.

The whole \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall \w flee|strong="H1272"\w* for the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* and \w bowmen|strong="H7198"\w*; they shall \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into \w thickets|strong="H5645"\w*, and climb \w up|strong="H5927"\w* upon the \w rocks|strong="H3710"\w*: every \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \add shall be\add* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w*, and not a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w therein|strong="H2004"\w*.

And \add when\add* thou \add art\add* \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*, what wilt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w*? Though thou \w clothest|strong="H3847"\w* thyself with \w crimson|strong="H8144"\w*, though thou \w deckest|strong="H5710"\w* thee with \w ornaments|strong="H5716"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, though thou \w rentest|strong="H7167"\w* thy \w face|strong="H5869"\w* with \w painting|strong="H6320"\w*, in \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* shalt thou make thyself \w fair|strong="H3302"\w*; \add thy\add* \w lovers|strong="H5689"\w* will \w despise|strong="H3988"\w* thee, they will \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.\f + \fr 4.30 \ft face: Heb. eyes\f*

For I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* as of a woman in \w travail|strong="H2470"\w*, \add and\add* the \w anguish|strong="H6869"\w* as of her that bringeth forth her first \w child|strong="H1069"\w*, the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \add that\add* \w bewaileth|strong="H3306"\w* herself, \add that\add* \w spreadeth|strong="H6566"\w* her \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* \add is\add* me now! for my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* is \w wearied|strong="H5888"\w* because of \w murderers|strong="H2026"\w*.
